name: SAGE
description: A front end for multi-game engine reimplementations, such as SCUMMVM, Free in the Dark, GemRB, and others.

scripts.pack:win: electron-packager . SAGE  --executable-name 'SAGE-1.1.1' --app-version=1.1.1 --ignore=release-builds --ignore=build_assets --ignore=_original_box_art --overwrite --version-string.LegalCopyright='Created by Justin harrelson' --platform=win32 --arch=x64,ia32 --icon=build_assets/icons/sage.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName='Justin Harrelson' --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName='SAGE'
scripts.pack:mac: electron-packager . SAGE --app-version=1.1.1 --ignore=release-builds --ignore=build_assets --ignore=_original_box_art --overwrite --version-string.LegalCopyright='Created by Justin harrelson' --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --arch=arm64 --icon=build_assets/icons/scummy.icns --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName='Justin Harrelson' --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName='SAGE'
scripts.pack:linux: electron-packager . SAGE  --executable-name 'SAGE-1.1.1' --app-version=1.1.1 --ignore=release-builds --ignore=build_assets --ignore=_original_box_art --overwrite --version-string.LegalCopyright='Created by Justin harrelson' --platform=linux --arch=ia32,x64,arm64 --icon=build_assets/icons/sage_icon_1024.png --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName='Justin Harrelson' --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName='SAGE'
scripts.build: node build_assets/scripts/changelog.js && npm run pack:win && npm run pack:linux && node build_assets/scripts/post_processing.js
scripts.build:mac: node build_assets/scripts/changelog.js && npm run pack:mac && node build_assets/scripts/post_processing.js

author: Justin Harrelson
